channel.title: [PROBLEM] Help me to solve it please :)
channel.description:
Hi, i've been installing the runescape server on my linux server, and i was using this tutorial:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367407.0.html
and i done the installation and now i need to run my server, im using this command
[code]sh run.sh[/code]
My run.sh file is:
[code]#!/bin/bash java -Xmx256m -d32 -client server[/code]
and when i run it, it runs normaly except this error and i cant connect to my server:
[code]root@cslt:~/RS/HybridScape# sh run.sh npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. Your server is now online.[/code]
and b.t.w. i skipped the tutorials 7 task. because the linux server is based not on my pc but in other companys [b]Sorting out your Router and DNS Server[/b] maybe thats why i cant connect to my own server? :) help me
My server source's original run line is like this:
[code]java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code] but when im using it i get this error:
[code]root@cslt:~/RS/HybridScape# sh run.sh Usage: java [-options] class [args...] (to execute a class) or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args...] (to execute a jar file)
where options include: -d32 use a 32-bit data model if available
-d64 use a 64-bit data model if available -client to select the "client" VM -server to select the "server" VM -hotspot is a synonym for the "client" VM [deprecated] The default VM is client.
-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files> -classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files> A : separated list of directories, JAR archives, and ZIP archives to search for class files. -D<name>=<value> set a system property -verbose[:class|gc|jni] enable verbose output -version print product version and exit -version:<value> require the specified version to run -showversion print product version and continue -jre-restrict-search | -jre-no-restrict-search include/exclude user private JREs in the version search -? -help print this help message -X print help on non-standard options -ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] -enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] enable assertions -da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] -disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>] disable assertions -esa | -enablesystemassertions enable system assertions -dsa | -disablesystemassertions disable system assertions -agentlib:<libname>[=<options>] load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help -agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>] load native agent library by full pathname -javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>] load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument -splash:<imagepath> show splash screen with specified image run.sh: line 2: ./jython.jar: No such file or directory run.sh: line 2: ./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar: No such file or directory[/code]
When adding a -client and -d32 to my run line, i get only this error:
[code]run.sh: line 2: ./jython.jar: No such file or directory run.sh: line 2: ./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar: No such file or directory[/code]
Thanks to all who tries to help me ! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2009, 05:06:03 am[/size][hr]bump up ![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2009, 05:12:07 am[/size][hr]BUMP UP!

item.title: [PROBLEM] Help me to solve it please :)
item.dc:creator: @addinol addinol
item.description:
@addinol wrote:

Hi, i’ve been installing the runescape server on my linux server, and i was using this tutorial:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

and i done the installation and now i need to run my server, im using this command

sh run.sh

My run.sh file is:

#!/bin/bash java -Xmx256m -d32 -client server

and when i run it, it runs normaly except this error and i cant connect to my server:

root@cslt:~/RS/HybridScape# sh run.sh npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. Your server is now online.

and b.t.w. i skipped the tutorials 7 task. because the linux server is based not on my pc but in other companys Sorting out your Router and DNS Server maybe thats why i cant connect to my own server? help me

My server source’s original run line is like this:

java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

but when im using it i get this error:

[code]root@cslt:~/RS/HybridScape# sh run.sh
Usage: java [-options] class [args…]
(to execute a class)
or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args…]
(to execute a jar file)

where options include:
-d32 use a 32-bit data model if available

-d64          use a 64-bit data model if available
-client       to select the "client" VM
-server       to select the "server" VM
-hotspot      is a synonym for the "client" VM  [deprecated]
              The default VM is client.

-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
-classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
              A : separated list of directories, JAR archives,
              and ZIP archives to search for class files.
-D<name>=<value>
              set a system property
-verbose[:class|gc|jni]
              enable verbose output
-version      print product version and exit
-version:<value>
              require the specified version to run
-showversion  print product version and continue
-jre-restrict-search | -jre-no-restrict-search
              include/exclude user private JREs in the version search
-? -help      print this help message
-X            print help on non-standard options
-ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              enable assertions
-da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              disable assertions
-esa | -enablesystemassertions
              enable system assertions
-dsa | -disablesystemassertions
              disable system assertions
-agentlib:<libname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof
                see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help
-agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library by full pathname
-javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>]
              load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument
-splash:<imagepath>
              show splash screen with specified image

run.sh: line 2: ./jython.jar: No such file or directory
run.sh: line 2: ./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar: No such file or directory[/code]

When adding a -client and -d32 to my run line, i get only this error:

run.sh: line 2: ./jython.jar: No such file or directory run.sh: line 2: ./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar: No such file or directory

Thanks to all who tries to help me !
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2009, 05:06:03 am[/size][hr]bump up ![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 19, 2009, 05:12:07 am[/size][hr]BUMP UP!
